sentences.sContent: an abundant supply of fresh water
abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.sCn: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

remMethod.val: ab(表加强) + und(波浪； 荡漾) + ant → 用力荡漾 → 大量的， 充足的

trans.tranCn: 大量的， 充足的， 丰富的
trans.tranOther: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough
